title: Startup Seeking Ruby Expert for Screen Scraping on AWS/SQL Stack
snippet:
Looking for a senior developer to write an automated (cron-based) script that will crawl an ecommerce site periodically and write to an RDS db. Preferred: ruby, elastic beanstalk, ec2, sql-RDS. You are ideally willing to mentor junior and intermediate devs.

Please detail relevant experience including past jobs, sites, and proxy use.
